prompts.title: Sales Follow-Up Email
prompts.body:
Hi {{name}},

Just checking in on our last conversation about {{product}}. Do you have any questions or need more details?

Best regards,
{{sender}}

prompts.title: Invoice Payment Reminder
prompts.body:
Hello {{name}},

This is a friendly reminder that invoice #{{invoice_number}} for {{amount}} is due on {{due_date}}.

Thank you,
{{sender}}

prompts.title: Operations Meeting Agenda
prompts.body:

Agenda:
